Shelby Operating Corporation v. W. T. Crosswhite, Administrator, &c. March 4, 1946. Record No. 2987.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Hudgins, Gregory, Browning and Spradey, JJ.

H. E. Widener and S. Bruce Jones, for the plaintiff in error. George M. Warren and Floyd H. Roberts, for the defendant in error.
